entry.title: Peter Nimble
entry.content:
Peter Nimble and His Fantastic Eyes

Author: Jonathan Auxier

Rating: 10/10

Peter Nimble is a child with extraorinary capabilities, he is a theif in an ordinary town, when he discovers a box of eyes, he embarks on a journey to find a missing island, and discover secrets about his past.

This book was very well writen, and kept the suspense well, the plot was very interesting and enjoyable, and good character development as well. In conclusion, I really enjoyed this book and would recomend it to lovers of fantasy
entry.summary: Peter Nimble and His Fantastic Eyes Author: Jonathan Auxier Rating: 10/10
